name: RGS
text: Good pizza and they kept the buffet well stocked

name: Sandi Trichell
text: I love it. There is always good food. I love the BBQ ribs. They have them everyday for lunch and supper. I always get the pizza I want. The best salad bar in town.  And always good , friendly service. My husband and I ate lunch there today. ‚Ä¶More

name: Derrick Williamson
text: What a great lunch! Food quality has dramatically improved since new owners have taken over and pizza tastes great. Fresh salad bar, lots of variety of pizza and friendly staff makes for a top dining choice.

name: Elizabeth Ann Barber
text: Amazing service and the food was great. I really enjoyed myself, and the staff was friendly and helpful with a good attitude. The ribs could use a little work but overall amazing!!

name: Sean Golden
text: Buffet was decent food was edible and filling...the dishes almost all had food stuck on them I assume because they had a bunch of young teens working there and probably don't make enough money to care appeared they simply sprayed a bit of ‚Ä¶More

name: Nathan Mullins
text: the food was absolutely amazing. the pizza was so fresh and crisp. the salad bar was so fresh and all the topping for the bar was delicious. I loved the fact that the wait staff was so quick to serve us and always had a smile on there face. ‚Ä¶More

name: Helen Gilbert
text: My friends and I meet up at Pizza Inn when we can. Today was a great time. Courtesy was outstanding. And the food was great! Thanks for making our special visit a good one !

name: Greg Sutton
text: Usually visit this Pizza Inn every time I visit my parents.  Kids love the buffet selection.  You must try the taco pizza!  This place actually makes me wish we had a Pizza Inn in our town.

name: Debbie
text: This place has decent food but it was a little bit pricey for the quality of their food. It doesn't taste bad or anything but we pay the same amount going to a nice Pizza buffet in Little Rock with much better Pizza. Sometimes they are ‚Ä¶More

name: Diane Casey
text: Sundays  is the best day ever to have a GREAT SALAD.BAR AND FRESH HOT PIZZA.  But to go around 12-1pm you've lost that fresh hot food I came.for. But the food is still good but not hot.  See ers try their best, but appear tired by my lunch ‚Ä¶More

text: Great place, good food. Buffet style and take out. Love this place.

name: SMH H
text: Stopped here on my way home from a weekend of fishing. All you can eat pizza was great with plenty to choose from. They also serve all you can eat wings that were pretty good.

name: Jazz Smith
text: Great salad bar! Lots of choices on pizza! They will even make you the pizza of your choice when you walk in and bring it to you first! Excellent service and atmosphere as always!

name: Daletta Walker
text: Best ever! My husband loved the wings and ribs. Everything on the buffet was hot and delicious with friendly service at a reasonable price.

name: Christopher Smith
text: The restaurant is under new ownership and it shows. We enjoyed everything, even a little live music. We will make this a regular place.

name: Phillip Allen
text: This is a good resturant.i don't like pizza but here i do workers are polite

name: Jonathan Lindsey
text: All day every day pizza buffet with wings buffet on Sunday. Staff was very pleasant and attentive. Very clean and modern dining area. Buffet pizzas fell short of amazing but the deserts made up for it.

name: Wee Whacka
text: Owner cutting too many corners to try to drive down food costs. They make their own "hot wings" that were definitely not fit to go on the buffet. Tasted like they should have been throw in the trash three or four days ago. I can't describe ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Miller
text: Good service. Food was only warm as most buffets. Lots of choices and BBQ ribs were a plus.

text: So enjoyed my meal at Pizza Inn today.  The salad bar was exceptionally fresh.   The staff was efficient and very friendly!

text: Super friendly staff and plenty of variety.  We were looking for something other than fast food or fried food and were happy with the dinner buffet choice.  Salad bar and pizza on request for the buffet.  Yum.

text: They have a wide variety and the food is pretty good. The customer service was great. The bathrooms were pretty dirty and needed a good cleaning.

text: Great selection of pizza and delicious hot wings. Ice cream and dessert pizza was fabulous also. Stuffed is my feeling.

name: Major Oz
text: Food and service is excellent and the price is right.  Breakfast compares favorably to the old days at Shoney's, with all the usual stuff and HUGE pork chops.  Owners are friendly and efficient.  Be sure to eat an OOEY-GOOEY -- kind of a soft sugar / cinnamon pizza.  Enjoy
